about_the_game:
Ruins of Istanbul is a VR Action Horror-shooter game with gore and linear campaign. The main sources of inspiration are Arizona Sunshine, Smell of Death and Walking Dead.
Ruins of Istanbul gives you an opportunity to experience Belgrad Forest in the north side of Istanbul. Different type of weapons give you ability to concentrate on fire when you are inside a group of zombies.
Mobility like climbing, shooting while sliding on zipline with a crowbar can give you fast paced actions in game.
The story is minimal because of the early access status of the game, however it will explain the untold mysteries in the full version.
The game targets the all types of players who love Action Shooters with dark theme.

Fate gave you a chance, will you manage to take it or die trying? There’s only one way to know: Fight!

**Disclamier: For now Virtual Desktop isn't suppported yet.

content_descriptors.notes: Since we start to kill the first zombie with the weapon we find at the beginning of the game, limb rupture, frequent bloodshed, head cuts and fragments are seen until the end of the game.

detailed_description:
Ruins of Istanbul is a VR Action Horror-shooter game with gore and linear campaign. The main sources of inspiration are Arizona Sunshine, Smell of Death and Walking Dead.
Ruins of Istanbul gives you an opportunity to experience Belgrad Forest in the north side of Istanbul. Different type of weapons give you ability to concentrate on fire when you are inside a group of zombies.
Mobility like climbing, shooting while sliding on zipline with a crowbar can give you fast paced actions in game.
The story is minimal because of the early access status of the game, however it will explain the untold mysteries in the full version.
The game targets the all types of players who love Action Shooters with dark theme.

Fate gave you a chance, will you manage to take it or die trying? There’s only one way to know: Fight!

**Disclamier: For now Virtual Desktop isn't suppported yet.
name: Ruins of Istanbul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: i5 8600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 590 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports. Medium graphics settings with playable frame rates
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: i7 9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 / 6600 XT or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Touch / HTC Vive controllers
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports. High graphics settings with smooth experience

short_description: Ruins of Istanbul is a VR Action Horror-shooter game. In post-apocalyptic Istanbul ruins, you have to stay calm, check your ammo and survive. With easy to play but hard to master mechanics, you will get carried away in Turkey!
